CustomField.description: Red: Account being worked. Only to be contacted by owner. Green: No Closed Lost deal in >180 days, no Contacts have been added in >7 days, account created >60 days ago, no activity on the account in >60 days, no owner change >42 days

CustomField.label: Account free to be prospected
